## Context and Problem Statement

We are about to start developing the prappser app aand... we have to agree on the architecture of the app. 
How to make state management? How to separate view from domain?

## Decision Drivers

- Separation of concerns
- Testability
- Pretty easy to understand

## Considered Options

- Riverpod architecture from codewithandrea.com

## Decision Outcome

Chosen option: "Riverpod architecture from codewithandrea.com"
